item.title: Rumor: Madden NFL 25 Release Date and Editions Leak Ahead of Reveal
item.description:
Highlights

  • Madden NFL 25 could be released on August 16, according to a new leak.
  • Better physics and fluid gameplay with reworked FieldSense technology could be featured in the upcoming Madden NFL 25.
  • The Deluxe Edition reportedly will include early access with pre-purchase, giving eager fans a chance to play nearly a week early.

Madden NFL 25 's release date has leaked, with the game reportedly set to release later this year on August 16. Fans have been trying to get more information regarding EA's next entry in the long-running Madden football franchise for quite some time, with NFL 25 's release date being kept under wraps. However, according to new leaks, Madden NFL 25 is reportedly only a few months away.

Players have kept busy with both online and Franchise play in Madden NFL 24 , which covered the 2023-2024 NFL season, since its release in late 2023. Madden NFL 24 marked the 35th entry in EA's long-running football franchise, and while it shipped with various bugs and glitches, the game became more polished over time, providing fans with one of the more robust and visually impressive offerings in recent memory. This could all change soon, with the release of Madden NFL 25 reportedly coming in just a few months.

Related
The Madden Games Are Trailing Behind NBA 2K and MLB Marketing

Madden needs to improve marketing legendary players to keep up with NBA 2K and MLB: The Show utilizing their all-time icons.

According to reliable data miner billbil-kun , fans can expect to see Madden NFL 25 hit physical and digital store shelves on August 16. Specific details regarding Madden NFL 25 are still unknown, such as the game's roster, but the report does reveal that the game will feature two separate editions: Standard and Deluxe. As is the case with a lot of modern video games, fans who pre-purchase the Deluxe Edition will get early access to the game. This early access extended to those who are subscribed to EA Play as well, allowing players to get their hands on Madden NFL 25 nearly a week early. Per billbil-kun, Madden NFL 25 's Standard edition will retail for $69.99, with the Deluxe edition coming in at $99.99. EA celebrated 25 years of football back in 2013 with a game titled Madden NFL 25 , but this year's iteration seeks to fundamentally shake things up.

New Leak Reveals Information About Madden NFL 25

The new leak claims the new entry will be a big improvement over past installments. FieldSense technology, which first debuted alongside Madden NFL 23 , is being reworked entirely to provide players with better physics and more realistic and fluid gameplay during games. An announcement for Madden NFL 25 could be coming on May 16, which is expected to give fans more information and an official release date.

EA's Madden series continues to be one of the best-selling video game franchises of all time, with new releases successfully stirring up interest year after year. However, 2024 is a very interesting point in time for EA, with the company gearing up to bring back its College Football franchise , which has not had a new entry since 2013. EA is expected to reveal the official cover for College Football 25 this summer.

item.title: The Sims 4 Teases New Expansion and Free Content Updates
item.description:
Highlights

  • The Sims 4 is celebrating its Season of Love with new content including an expansion pack and two destination kits.
  • Free updates like new swimwear are keeping the game fresh after almost a decade since its release in 2014.
  • The Sims 5, codenamed Project Rene, is in development, but little has been officially revealed about the game yet.

EA has unveiled the next content coming to The Sims 4 , with an expansion pack, two destination kits, and two free updates. These new additions to the game are part of The Sims 4 's Season of Love, which hints at some of the content that will be releasing.

The Sims 4 is rapidly approaching its tenth anniversary, but the content has never stopped flowing for the game. Regular additions and updates come out for the title, some free and some paid, helping to keep the game fresh after all these years. While the game has added a lot of content for purchase, some of these additions have been free, giving more content to everyone, including those who already got The Sims 4 for free .

Related
Best Games To Play If You Like The Sims 4

From mobile games to Second Life, these are the best games for lovers of the Sims.

Now, EA has teased the content coming to The Sims 4 . Effective immediately, a new update has launched that adds some new swimwear to the game, as seen in a brief teaser released by the company. At the moment, the information regarding the new releases is intentionally vague. The Sims 4 says that the "stylish updates" "polish the look" of the Sims. Given the swimwear in the first release and the image shared with this description, the next launch may have to do with Sims' hair and nails.

The two destination kits are similarly vague. A small thumbnail was shown of what looks like an old-fashioned bar or eatery, as well as a pool with a fancy waterfall. The text of "nectar leading to a provacative plunge" hints at the idea of new drinking locales and pool activities. Finally, the expansion pack has only been given a brief description of "Made waves, but we WooHoo'd anyway." The expansion is also described as being flirtatious. While the destination kits are more straightforward in their hints, the nature of the expansion pack is largely a mystery at this point, other than having something to do with summertime romance. The reference to "waves," however, may indicate that it's something to do with the beach, so perhaps the Sims will be going on vacation somewhere on the water.

What's Next for The Sims?

It's clear from the announcement of these new releases that there's still plenty for players of The Sims 4 to look forward to. However, that doesn't mean there isn't a new entry on the horizon. The Sims 5 , codenamed Project Rene , is in development at the studio. However, very little has been officially revealed about the game since its initial announcement back in 2022. While there have been leaks, the game could undergo significant alterations prior to its launch. At the moment, players will just have to wait, but there's certainly no lack of content for The Sims 4 to keep fans of the franchise occupied.

item.title: Research Firm Estimates How Much PS5 Outsold Xbox Series X/S in Q1 2024
item.description:
Highlights

  • Sony's PS5 outsold Microsoft's Xbox Series X/S by nearly 5:1 in Q1 of 2024, with 4.5 million units shipped.
  • PS5 sales dominance continues, with past years showing margins of 2:1 in 2021 and nearly 3:1 in 2023.
  • Microsoft's hardware revenue dropped 31% as PS5 surpasses 50 million units sold, rumors of a PS5 Pro to further lead.

According to estimations from a research firm, Sony shipped nearly five times as many PlayStation 5 consoles as Microsoft did Xbox Series X/S consoles in the first quarter of 2024. Sony's latest earnings call revealed staggering sales numbers for the PS5 , with the console surpassing 59.3 million units sold in its lifetime so far.

Since their near-simultaneous launches in November 2020, the PS5 has consistently outsold its Microsoft competitor duo, the Xbox Series X/S. Even though Microsoft stopped reporting hardware sales numbers long ago, Xbox hardware revenue saw a 31% drop at the company's last earnings call, with further declines projected for the future. By sharp contrast, Sony recently reported an impressive 4.5 million PS5 consoles shipped in calendar Q1 2024.

Related
New Xbox Console Leaks Online

A new Microsoft console leaks online, with recent reports indicating this could be the long-rumored digital-only edition of the Xbox Series X.

With the lack of concrete sales figures for Xbox consoles, it's tricky to compare the competitors' sales like-for-like, but analysts and research firms do come up with estimates based on their internal calculations and sources. Director of research and insights at Niko Partners, Daniel Ahmad, recently posted a Twitter thread analyzing key takeaways from Sony's latest earnings call, and revealed that according to the firm's estimates, PS5 shipments outperformed Xbox Series X/S shipments by a ratio of nearly 5:1 during the first calendar quarter of 2024 (January 1, 2024 to March 31, 2024). Since Sony has disclosed PS5 shipments for that quarter to be 4.5 million, that leaves Xbox in the 800k-900k region.

PS5's Sales Supremacy Has Remained Consistent

This trend mirrors data from previous years, with reports from Take-Two and Ampere Analysis indicating PS5 sales outpaced Xbox Series X/S by margins of 2:1 in 2021 and nearly 3:1 in 2023. The strong 2023 holiday season, as well as widespread availability, also helped PS5 surpass 50 million units sold last December. Sony's outlook on the console remains positive, even though it narrowly missed its 21 million sales projection for financial year 2023. Meanwhile, Microsoft's emphasis on Xbox hardware seems to be fading slowly with Series X/S consoles' continually declining sales.

However, Microsoft has confirmed that it's not throwing in the towel yet, as the company is "moving full speed ahead" on the next-gen successor to the Xbox Series X/S. Many believe it will be a home console, but Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer has teased the prospect of an Xbox handheld. Whatever it may be, it's most likely several years away. For the moment, Sony is dominating on the hardware sales front, and with the heavily rumored PS5 Pro coming later this year , that lead may increase even further.

item.title: World of Warcraft: The War Within Has Good News for Dog Lovers
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fans of World of Warcraft can make the beloved Dog a companion pet in The War Within expansion.
  • Dog first stole hearts in Mists of Pandaria on the Tillers Farm, responding to emotes like /pet and /love.
  • In The War Within, Dog becomes a faithful companion pet, but unlocking him may require several steps.

World of Warcraft is bringing back the adorable Dog from Mists of Pandaria once again in The War Within – but this time, as a full-fledged companion pet. Nearly 12 years after first meeting him, and eight years after his last appearance, World of Warcraft players can finally bring Dog with them on all of their adventures.

Back in Mists of Pandaria , World of Warcraft fans could get a dog on their Tillers Farm . Aptly named Dog, the critter stole the hearts of players with his special interactions with certain emotes. In Warlords of Draenor , he followed WoW fans to their Garrisons, and Legion allowed them to relocate their faithful pet to the new version of Dalaran, where he has stayed ever since.

Related
World of Warcraft Update Makes Adorable Change to One Mount and Fixes Frustrating Bugs

World of Warcraft's latest hotfix gives one beloved mount a minor feature designed to make players fall in love with him even more.

However, with Dalaran in danger in World of Warcraft: The War Within , many fans worried about their trusty canine companion. Luckily, considering his appearance in the Collections tab in The War Within alpha, Dog not only avoids any disastrous fate in the expansion but actually becomes a companion pet that can accompany players on their journeys as the Faithful Dog. It isn’t known exactly how one unlocks this pet yet, but it is a safe bet that one may need to unlock him on their farms, bring them to the Garrison, and then relocate it to Legion Dalaran in order to do so.

The History of Dog in World of Warcraft

  • Dog first appeared in Mists of Pandaria , where he comes to the Tillers Farm after completing the Lost and Lonely quest.
    • The critter gained popularity because he responds to emotes like /pet, /love, and /kiss.

  • Players who have Dog in Mists of Pandaria can find him at their Garrison in World of Warcraft: Warlords of Draenor .
  • By finding a hidden pebble in Legion Dalaran and giving it to Dog at the Garrison, he can find his way to the floating city, where he stays with Breanni at her pet shop.
  • In The War Within , fans can finally bring Dog with them as a companion pet.

Fans will have another opportunity to meet Dog for the first time in World of Warcraft Remix: Mists of Pandaria . Players will be able to experience all the expansion’s content at an accelerated rate, ostensibly letting them invite Dog to their Tillers Farm all over again.

Cat lovers need not fear, for World of Warcraft: The War Within has plenty of content for them as well. In addition to the adorable giant lynxes players can find, pet, and collect as mounts and companions in Hallowfall, World of Warcraft fans can pick up chubby cats scattered around Dornogal . It seems like World of Warcraft: The War Within has something in it for everyone, regardless of whether they are a dog or cat person.

item.title: Dead by Daylight Year 9 Roadmap Revealed
item.description:
Highlights

  • Dead by Daylight's 2024 Year 9 Roadmap teases bigger horror icons and game modes for fans to enjoy.
  • New gameplay content, licensed chapters, events, and characters like Vecna and Dracula are on the way.
  • Year 9 promises exciting updates and surprises, with four licenses set to appear, showing the game's ongoing success.

Following one of the biggest years for Dead by Daylight , 2024 is shaping up to surpass it in terms of sheer scale and promise, according to the Year 9 Roadmap. With bigger names and licenses ever attracted to the definitive asymmetrical horror game, in Dead by Daylight ’s ninth year, fans can be sure to see even more horror icons arrive in The Fog.

In 2023, Dead by Daylight saw the inclusion of characters like Child’s Play ’s Chucky , and the titular extraterrestrial from Alien . Behaviour Interactive also celebrated the release of its biggest original DLC chapter to date, “All Things Wicked,” which brought The Unknown and Sable Ward into The Entity’s trials.

Related
Dead by Daylight Reveals New Dungeons and Dragons Crossover Killer

Dead by Daylight is adding an iconic killer from the world of Dungeons and Dragons to celebrate the game's eighth anniversary.

In the eighth anniversary livestream, Behaviour unveiled the Year 9 Roadmap for Dead by Daylight , showcasing the upcoming content cycle for the game. From June 2024 to April 2025, fans can expect to see three full licensed chapters, one original chapter, and two “paragraphs” featuring one original and one licensed Survivor. Furthermore, they will get to experience a host of new game modes, modifiers, in-game events, and Tomes in the coming year.

Dead by Daylight Year 9 Roadmap

June

  • Dungeons & Dragons Chapter
  • Vecna Killer
  • Twisted Masquerade Event

July

  • New Licensed Survivor
  • 2v8 Limited Time Mode
  • Tome 20 Release

August

  • Castlevania Chapter
  • Dracula Killer

September

  • New Modifier

October

  • Haunted by Daylight Event
  • Tome 21 Release

December

  • New Original Chapter
  • Bone Chill Event

January

  • Tome 23 Release

March

  • New Licensed Killer
  • Blood Moon Event

April

  • New Original Survivor

Next month, Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons will bring a new Killer, Survivor, and Map to the game. Celebrating 50 years of Dungeons & Dragons , the Lich King Vecna is coming to Dead by Daylight with new powers and perks to play with. Right now, players on the Steam version of Dead by Daylight can playtest the new Chapter in preparation for its full release on June 3. Furthermore, as leaked late last year, Dracula from Castlevania will follow Vecna as the next Killer. Revealed at the very end of the anniversary livestream, players can hear more about this license on August 6.

Rounding off the Year 9 Roadmap, the rest of the year will feature two other Licensed Chapters and two original Chapters, one featuring a single Survivor – similar to Mikaela Reid in Hour of the Witch . Behaviour has also revealed the development of a 2v8 LTM, in which two Killers will face off against eight Survivors. As usual, the Halloween and Holiday seasonal events that fans have come to expect will also be reappearing throughout the year.

This roadmap is far from comprehensive, and players are sure to see plenty more throughout the upcoming year – both in Dead by Daylight , and in The Casting of Frank Stone. This is the first year that four licenses have been set to appear in the game, and is an indication of just how much of a cultural and commercial success Dead by Daylight has proven to be , even eight years into its lifespan.
